original_title: Every Time I Die: Shit Happens (The Life. The Stage. The Road. The DVD)
overview: From the back sleeve:  -2+ Hours of one of a kind ETID footage  -Ridiculous amounts of LIVE songs shot around the US  -Scandalous Hidden Extras... that's right, 'scandalous'  -Never Before Seen "Behind The Scenes" footage from their US tour, their Buffalo Christmas show, Warped Tour, AND raucous home videos  -EVERY ETID video ever made  -And of course, the directorial genius of High Roller Studio's Doug Spangenberg.
title: Every Time I Die: Shit Happens (The Life. The Stage. The Road. The DVD)
